Observed at: Fort St. John Airport 5:00 PM MST Saturday 1 April 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 81 km
Humidity: 70 %

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries late this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 20 after midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
